Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the films *Fifty Shades of Grey* and *Fifty Shades Darker*?
Options:
A. Universal Pictures distributed *Fifty Shades of Grey*.
B. Universal Pictures is also the distributor for *Fifty Shades Darker*.
C. Both films are adaptations of the same book series.
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of *Fifty Shades of Grey*?
Options:
A. a) Universal Pictures is the distributor for *Fifty Shades of Grey*.
B. b) Donna Langley is the chair of Universal Pictures.
C. c) Donna Langley described the second installment as 'more of a thriller'.
D. d) Fifty Shades of Grey was produced by Warner Bros.
Answer: a) Universal Pictures is the distributor for *Fifty Shades of Grey*., b) Donna Langley is the chair of Universal Pictures., c) Donna Langley described the second installment as 'more of a thriller'.

Question: Which of the following films were distributed by Universal Pictures?
Options:
A. Fifty Shades Darker
B. Fifty Shades Freed
C. Fifty Shades of Grey
D. All of the above
Answer: Fifty Shades Darker, Fifty Shades Freed

Options:
A. a) Universal Pictures is the distributor for *Fifty Shades Darker*.
B. b) *Fifty Shades Darker* is a sequel.
C. c) The script for the sequel was confirmed in July 2015.
D. d) All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the Fifty Shades film series?
Options:
A. a) Sam Taylor-Johnson announced the sequels during a fan screening.
B. b) Fifty Shades Darker was released in 2016.
C. c) Fifty Shades Freed is a sequel to Fifty Shades Darker.
D. d) All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the production of *Fifty Shades Darker*?
Options:
A. Sam Taylor-Johnson announced the sequels would be adapted.
B. Fifty Shades Darker was confirmed to be shot back-to-back with its third film.

D. All of the above
